B

buildCommandLine(File) - Method in class gate.taggerframework.GenericTagger
This method constructs an array of Strings which will be used as the command line for executing the external tagger through a call to Runtime.exec().

C

cleanup() - Method in class gate.taggerframework.GenericTagger
 

E

execute() - Method in class gate.taggerframework.GenericTagger
This method does all the work by calling the protected methods in the right order so that an input file is written, a command line is built, the tagger is run and then finally the output of the tagger is added as annotations onto the GATE document being processed.

G

gate.taggerframework - package gate.taggerframework
 
GenericTagger - Class in gate.taggerframework
This processing resource is designed to allow the easy use of a number of external (non Java) taggers within GATE.
GenericTagger() - Constructor for class gate.taggerframework.GenericTagger
 
getCurrentText() - Method in class gate.taggerframework.GenericTagger
This method copies specific annotations from the current GATE document into a file that can be read by the tagger.
